about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Not every gift is the same. Some whisper what words can never say.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: At Forma, we believe that every imprint tells a story, every touch preserves a memory, and every heart has someone who deserves a place forever. We transform precious moments into timeless artworks that touch the soul and last eternally.

process.title: Our Process
process.content: With high-quality German silicone, completely safe for the skin, we create accurate molds of body parts — such as a loved one's hand, a child's fingerprint, or a mother's gentle hand — and shape them into jewelry or 3D sculptures filled with emotion.

quality.title: Quality & Art
quality.content: Each creation is made with the precision of an artist, the passion of a lover, and the elegance of gold. It's not just a gift… It's a symbol of love, memory, and eternity.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.content: We work with artists, sculptors, and families who want to make memories tangible. Our products combine art, science, and humanity, making your imprint last forever.

about.closing: Because some memories deserve to be touched. Forma – where your story takes shape.
